ygData.subject: Kyle Stewart
ygData.msgSnippet: Yah... Kyle, your post was, fraid to say, a large mode. *sigh* Now I ll list what you did wrong: 1) Drones are not permitted to do battle or anything like

Yah... Kyle, your post was, 'fraid to say, a large mode. *sigh* Now 
I'll list what you did wrong:

1) Drones are not permitted to do battle or anything like that, 
besides repairs at a base, and even then they are limited.

2) Your pocket size drone is also illegal, it makes no sense at all.

3) As Proto said, you can't control other people's bases, and that 
includes the autoguns, shields, security systems, etc.

4) There ARE bots in the Alliance base, and they'd likely try to 
stop any intruders.

5) If your cyber arrow can actually destroy a door, then it'll have to 
be made illegal.

6) A frequency jammer only prevents the bases scanners from 
detecting an enemy signal, it doesn't prevent the cameras from 
seeing the bot, or anything else, depending on what the security 
systems of the Iron Fist can do.

7) You have done FAR too much in this post, as several people 
have mentioned.


I suggest that you re-read the rules, and consider all other RPers 
before posting something better suited for a story that you've 
written. The council will dicuss this in more depth.

Your post is officially illegal, and nobody has to post a response to 
it.

How long has it been since you played in the rpg? Your post 
suggests that you've been here before, and that your characters 
seem to have a strong dislike for the Alliance.


On 15 Jul 2001, at 16:07, Kyle Stewart wrote:

> I said check not check-mate so the "Alliance" can
> still try to stop the bomb.
>
